Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: People are talking about the Reserve Bank amidst criticism about their approach to raising interest rates during times of financial struggle for many Australians. The bank is set to undergo a major shake-up with restructuring to its boardroom and leadership structure to increase transparency and accountability. However experts are warning borrowers that this doesn't necessarily mean lower interest rates. Tasmanians are pushing for an alternate vision for Macquarie Point amidst the government's proposal for a stadium.
